overview: The only one sin that these ladies commit; unconventional love! Rain Degrey and Prinzzess headline this revealing twisted road from desire to pursuit and surrender in over 2 hours of the most realistic sex in the Lesbian adult world. Brandi Love, Ashlynn Leigh, Julia Ann, Charley Monroe, Veronica Snow, and Karina White round of this cast of older/younger lesbian seductresses!
tagline: Their only sin is unconventional love!
title: Lesbian Seductions: Older/Younger 44
